name: kenshir0f-portfolio
author: Kenshiro Fujii
description: Next.js / Typescript / Firebase, hosted on cloud functions

scripts.build: yarn clean && tsc && cp src/components/Atoms/Icon/style.css dist/components/Atoms/Icon && next build ./dist && cp package.json dist/package.json && yarn create-public
scripts.__build: yarn clean && tsc && cp src/components/Atoms/Icon/style.css dist/components/Atoms/Icon && cp src/pages/style.css dist/pages && next build ./dist
scripts.watch-static: watch-run -i -p 'src/static/**' 'rm -rf dist/static && mkdir dist/static && cp src/static/* dist/static'
scripts.create-public: mkdir dist/public/static && cp src/static/* dist/public/static && echo "not used" > dist/public/__placeholder.html
